query:
SELECT 
  c.propertyId,
  c.downPayment,
  c.installmentAmount,
  COUNT(i.id) AS total_installments,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.type = 'REGULAR' AND i.status = 'PAID' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS regular_paid,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.type = 'BALLOON' AND i.status = 'PAID' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS balloon_paid,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.type = 'DOWN_PAYMENT' AND i.status = 'PAID' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS down_paid,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.type = 'REGULAR' AND (i.status = 'PENDING' OR i.status = 'OVERDUE') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS regular_pending,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.status = 'PAID' THEN CAST(COALESCE(i.paidAmount, i.amount) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) ELSE 0 END) AS total_paid_amount,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.status IN ('PENDING', 'OVERDUE') THEN CAST(i.amount AS DECIMAL(10,2)) ELSE 0 END) AS balance_due,
  (SELECT CAST(amount AS DECIMAL(10,2)) FROM installments WHERE contractId = c.id AND type = 'BALLOON' LIMIT 1) AS balloon_amount
FROM contracts c
LEFT JOIN installments i ON c.id = i.contractId
WHERE c.propertyId = '#25'
GROUP BY c.propertyId, c.downPayment, c.installmentAmount, c.id;

  c.installmentAmount,
  COUNT(i.id) AS total_installments,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.type = 'REGULAR' AND i.status = 'PAID' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS regular_paid,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.type = 'BALLOON' AND i.status = 'PAID' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS balloon_paid,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.type = 'DOWN_PAYMENT' AND i.status = 'PAID' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS down_paid,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.type = 'REGULAR' AND (i.status = 'PENDING' OR i.status = 'OVERDUE') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS regular_pending,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.status = 'PAID' THEN CAST(COALESCE(i.paidAmount, i.amount) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) ELSE 0 END) AS total_paid_amount,
  SUM(CASE WHEN i.status IN ('PENDING', 'OVERDUE') THEN CAST(i.amount AS DECIMAL(10,2)) ELSE 0 END) AS balance_due,
  (SELECT CAST(amount AS DECIMAL(10,2)) FROM installments WHERE contractId = c.id AND type = 'BALLOON' LIMIT 1) AS balloon_amount
FROM contracts c
LEFT JOIN installments i ON c.id = i.contractId
WHERE c.propertyId = '#25'
GROUP BY c.propertyId, c.downPayment, c.installmentAmount, c.id;
